publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-634# Alex Neil: Breeding of Animalsâ€”That the Parliament expresses concern at the inadequacy of current legislation in respect of the breeding of animals, in particular domestic pets, and believes that urgent action should be taken to deal with this situation.

S2M-634# Alex Neil: Breeding of Animals-That the Parliament expresses concern at the inadequacy of current legislation in respect of the breeding of animals, in particular domestic pets, and believes that urgent action should be taken to deal with this situation. Supported by: Carolyn Leckie*, Frances Curran*
S2M-634# Breeding of Animals (lodged on 20 November 2003) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-634# Breeding of Animals (lodged on 20 November 2003) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-634# Breeding of Animals (lodged on 20 November 2003) Christine Grahame*, Rosie Kane*
